about_the_game:
Sweet Coffee Shop - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery. (Updated AI painting style, more fresh and real)

- The game has three difficulties
- Press the "F" key to turn on the black and white picture during collage
- Players can press the 'Space bar' during the game to complete the puzzle.
- Players can press the AD button, the left and right buttons, or the mouse left and right buttons to quickly view the girl's pictures in the gallery

* The image has been increased from 640x960 to 800x960.

highlighted.name: Do you taste coffee from me?

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Contains female masturbation content
-Clear depiction of female reproductive organs
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
